oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Martha White Flour Company Job No. 36680
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Accounting; Hatch Show Print (Firm); Jim and Jesse;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Invoice (No. 1234) for an order placed by the Martha White Flour Company for 50 two color window cards for a performance by Jim and Jesse at the High School Auditorium in Hinesville, Georgia on April 15, 100 two color window cards for a performance by Jim and Jesse in Savannah, Georgia on April 16, 50 two color window cards for a performance by Jim and Jesse at the Elementary School Auditorium in Hazelhurst, Georgia on April 17, and 50 two color window cards for a performance by Jim and Jesse at the High School Auditorium in Greenville, Alabama on April 22. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.
